text: we've always been focused on the
nonprofit industry it's exclusively what
our technology focuses on and our
mission to mobilize and empower the
world for good is deeply embedded in
bringing the best world-class technology
to help nonprofits solve the world's
toughest problems one of the biggest
problems for nonprofits especially in
the fundraising area right now is the
lack of return donors so 82% of new
donors turn every single year it's hard
to imagine a for-profit company they
could stay in business if they had to
get 82% new customers every year and
what we've seen in our research is not
only is there an issue with people
coming back and donating a second time
but recurring donors someone who signed
up to continue to donate over time
they're five times more valuable to a
non-profit so in order for nonprofits to
be sustainable and really complete their
mission of feeding the hungry of solving
environmental problems of keeping rare
species of animals alive they need to
find a sustainable funding option to
make sure that they can keep doing their
important business the tools that they
use have to be easy they have to be
secure they have to be cost effective
because what they need is just to get
past the necessary evils of solving
these problems so they can get back to
what they really care about which is
their mission we have been on AWS since
2015 we built on AWS because we are
focused on bringing modern cloud
enterprise-class software to the
nonprofit industry they deserve that
they are working on some of the most
difficult problems in the world and they
can't use free software hand-me-downs
and sloppysecondz
we wanted to bring them the best
nonprofit fundraising software on top of
the most secure most scalable technology
platform we just unveiled the new classy
fundraising suite redesign from the
ground up peer-to-peer crowdfunding
events direct donations and
international fundraising all built on
AWS at classy we started off as
fundraisers ourselves we were raising
money for the American Cancer Society
and realized that nonprofits needed a
better technology to do that and so we
created that technology so everything we
do
has the donor and the nonprofit in mind
so class ease focus is on being
beautiful reliable and creating a real
meaningful connection at scale
